Title: Best Man for the Gob
Plot: George Sr. uses Gob's bachelor party as an opportunity to set up his accountant in a compromising position so that he can blackmail him.  Meanwhile, Michael tries to prove he's a fun guy, and the Funkes reunite their family folk-music band.
GuestStars: Michael Hitchcock, Lauren Bowles, Michael Blieden, Dan Horton, Luciano Giancarlo, Danielle Cipolla, Andrew Hill Newman
